question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the entrance of the community, with a moon-shaped blue pool in front. At the current location, if the entrance to the community is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. I cannot see the entrance to the residential area, but there is a parking lot in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
B. I cannot see the entrance to the residential area, but there is a basketball court in the center of my field of view.  
C. I cannot see the entrance to the residential area, but there is a playground on the upper left side of my field of view.  
D. I can see the entrance to the residential complex.  
E. I cannot see the entrance to the residential area, but there is a group of high-rise buildings below my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current field of view shows a basketball court in the center, which is a prominent feature in the image. The entrance to the community is not visible from this perspective.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 5), (1:10, 1:15), (3:43, 3:52)]
Option: B
Reason: From the initial position (0:00-0:05), the entrance to the residential area is not visible. A basketball court is located in the center of the field of view. The video also shows the moon-shaped blue pool (1:10-1:15, 3:43-3:52), which is behind the current location. Therefore, the most relevant object in the field of view is the basketball court.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current field of view shows a basketball court in the center, which is a prominent feature in the image. The entrance to the community is not visible from this perspective.
